      • createOpponentRow

        public static javafx.scene.layout.Pane createOpponentRow​(java.lang.String username,
                                                         java.lang.String color,
                                                         java.lang.String moneyValue,
                                                         javafx.scene.image.ImageView logo,
                                                         javafx.scene.layout.Pane opponentsContainer)
        This method is used to draw an opponent row in the sidebar in the game view
        Parameters:
        username - of the actual user
        color - of the player
        moneyValue - The value of the money text field
        opponentsContainer - Target container for opponents
        Returns:
        A pane that works as a container for the property icon. Must be returned since onclick must be defined in gameController since this class is static.

        time - when the message was sent
